# Loading Data

##### Before sharepoint API issue is resolved, load data directly from local machine

```{r}

# read in csv files for all cell populations

df_hsc <- read.csv2(here("local_data/group6_data_HSC_Report.csv"))
df_cmp <- read.csv2(here("local_data/group6_data_CMP_Report.csv"))
df_clp <- read.csv2(here("local_data/group6_data_CLP_Report.csv"))
df_mep <- read.csv2(here("local_data/group6_data_MEP_Report.csv"))
df_gmp <- read.csv2(here("local_data/group6_data_GMP_Report.csv"))
```
